attributes.action: Our medical history  on computer  should be a correct record of session
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That no one following a remit, contract  and procedures should adapt and omit  vital medical  information  when put on a computer in surgeries and hospitals and that Doctors should oversee , have responsibility  & check this is so .

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
